alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 23 at 7:47AM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow continues with another 2 to 4 inches expected through the morning hours. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Western Rutland, Eastern Rutland, Western Windsor and Eastern Windsor Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could approach 1 inch per hour at times, especially through 11 AM Monday. Snow tapers off into showers by late afternoon into early evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
